about_me.des: I am a software developer from Karlshamn, currently living in Karlskrona, Sweden.

projects.minopt: Project made to test performance differences between monolithic and microservices-based systems for our bachelor thesis
projects.orcd: An operational dashboard visualizing worldwide roaming usage and and product usage from generated fake CDR events

career.qvantel_desc: I started working at Qvantel for the summer, creating a PoC and testing and refactoring existing scala applications. Main technologies; Scala, Grafana, Elastic-stack
career.bth_desc: Graduated Software Engineering with a bachelors degree at BTH
